text:
Created attachment 33007
patch against trunk.

The Semaphore Valve does not exist in the Valve configuration document.
Therefore, I created a document.
creator: nakamura.kyohei.lab@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report and the patch.

The patch has been applied (with some minor changes) to trunk, 8.0.x (for 8.0.26 onwards), 7.0.x (for 7.0.64 onwards) and 6.0.x (for 6.0.45 onwards).
